Author: Bomby57
Text: I feel so sorry about this. This is a toxic person. I hope you can get your own path and avoid her? Surround yourself with supporting people, and ignore her as much as possible :(

Author: nodamncatnodamncradl
Text: I'm sorry, your mother sounds pretty terrible. For your information, when a parent shames and insults you it is emotional/verbal abuse.   Please consider looking into resources/reaching out for assistance if you haven't already. Let me know if you want me to use google and look for resources where you live.
